solution_line_template: The weight of {num_crates} crates of vegetables is {num_crates} * {weight_per_crate} = <<{num_crates}*{weight_per_crate}={weight_crates}>>{weight_crates} kilograms.
The weight of {num_cartons} cartons of vegetables is {num_cartons} * {weight_per_carton} = <<{num_cartons}*{weight_per_carton}={weight_cartons}>>{weight_cartons} kilograms.
So the total weight of all crates and cartons is {weight_crates} + {weight_cartons} = <<{weight_crates}+{weight_cartons}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} kilograms.
